import React, { useRef } from 'react' import './App.css'; import NameBox from './components/NameBox' import LinkOverlay from './components/LinkOverlay' import AppBar from './components/AppBar' import Card from './components/Card' import styled, { keyframes } from 'styled-components' const App = () => { const links = [ { label: 'LinkedIn', url: 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/kyle-gloria/', image: 'https://www.iconninja.com/files/479/390/409/linkedin-icon.png', id: '1' }, { label: 'GitHub', url: 'https://github.com/KGloria', image: 'https://www.iconninja.com/files/930/277/269/github-icon.png', id: '2' } ] const projects = [ {title: 'Web Portfolio', image: 'https://www.colorhexa.com/9e7d68.png', link: '', description: 'Website developed in ReactJS framework', id: '1' }, {title: 'Chatroom App', image: 'https://www.colorhexa.com/EBC8B2.png', link: '', description: 'Fullstack chatroom app developed in ReactJS framework', id: '2' }, {title: 'Pet Door', image: 'https://www.colorhexa.com/FFE9DB.png', link: '', description: 'Petdoor prototype developed in python', id: '3' }, {title: 'Note App', image: 'https://www.colorhexa.com/599C9E.png', link: '', description: 'Fullstack note app develped in ReactJS framework', id: '4' }, {title: '3D Unity Game', image: 'https://www.colorhexa.com/B2E9EB.png', link: '', description: 'C# game using Unity Engine. (Two minigames)', id: '5' }, {title: 'Unix Shell', image: 'https://www.colorhexa.com/B2E9EB.png', link: '', description: 'Implementation of TCSH Unix Shell in C', id: '6' }, {title: 'Homelab', image: 'https://www.colorhexa.com/689C9E.png', link: '', description: 'Personal server for Minecraft, Plex, & Webhosting', id: '7' }, {title: 'Calculator', image: 'https://www.colorhexa.com/2E5052.png', link: '', description: 'C# implementation of Windows 10 calculator', id: '8' } ] const pg1 = useRef(null) const pg2 = useRef(null) const pg3 = useRef(null) const Container = styled.div` border: 10px solid white; min-width: 50vw; width: 1200px; display: flex; flex-direction: row; overflow: hidden; ` return ( <>

); } export default App;
